setup.title: Accident insurance
setup.detail: Insurance helps offset the financial impact of receiving treatment and the subsequent recovery after an accident.
bullets: Accident insurance for children, adults, and families with global coverage.
Double benefits in case of a traffic accident.
Children receive double benefits during all school holidays.
setup.info: The specific amount you will receive depends on the severity of the injury. What is covered, and what are the limits?

types.name: Junior
types.description: Insurance for you and your child in case you need to take care of them and/or accompany them while they are hospitalized. With double benefits during all school holidays and in case of a car accident.

alternative.title: During school holidays and in case of a car accident

limit.title: Hospital stay with a child after an accident

alternative.title: During school holidays and in case of a car accident

values.title: Coverage expires:
values.value: On the day of the child’s 27th birthday

types.name: Single

values.title: Entry age:
values.value: 18 - 65 years of age for adults, 0 - 18 years for children.

values.title: Insurance ends:
values.value: On the last day of the calendar year in which the adult turns 70 years of age or children turns 18 years of age.

summary.checkboxNotDisabled:
I, as the owner of the Current Account, that I do not suffer 
disability of I.-III. degree.
summary.info1: Carefully read the Accident Insurance information materials, which set out the exclusions and limits of insurance coverage.
summary.info2: The contractual documentation will be sent to you in electronic form. You can receive a physical copy in any branch of MONETA Money Bank.
